lead_paragraph: The meeting, scheduled for Feb. 12 in Cuba, will be the first meeting between a pope and the Russian patriarch.

byline.contributor: Elisabetta Povoledo reported from Vatican City, and Jim Yardley from Rome. Ivan Nechepurenko contributed reporting from Moscow.
byline.original: By ELISABETTA POVOLEDO and JIM YARDLEY

headline.print_headline: In a First, Francis Plans to Meet With Leader of the Russian Orthodox Church
headline.main: In Historic Move, Pope to Meet With Leader of Russian Orthodox Church

snippet: The meeting, scheduled for Feb. 12 in Cuba, will be the first meeting between a pope and the Russian patriarch.
abstract: Pope Francis plans to meet with Russian Orthodox Church leader Patriarch Kirill I in Cuba in February, first ever meeting between  pope and Russian patriarch; meeting marks significant point in Francis's effort to reconcile Roman Catholic and Eastern Orthodox churches.
